name: execute-read-command
description: Execute a read-only CLI command (get, search, list, show). Use discover-commands first to find the right command.

command.description: CLI command path (e.g., 'person get', 'company search', 'list show')

maxOutputBytes.description: Maximum output size in bytes. Larger outputs are truncated with truncated=true marker.

dryRun.description: If true, return the command that would be executed without running it.
